text: Patient admitted with chest pain radiating to the arm. ECG shows ST depression in inferior leads. Troponin 0.8 ng/mL. Diagnosed with unstable angina and started on aspirin and beta-blocker.
label: cardio

text: History of myocardial infarction 2 years ago. Echocardiogram shows EF 40%. Patient continues on statin, ACE inhibitor, and dual antiplatelet therapy.
label: cardio

text: Persistent hypertension despite treatment. Added lisinopril 10 mg daily. BP improved to 130/80 mmHg after two weeks.
label: cardio

text: Post-PCI follow-up. No recurrent angina. ECG normal. Lipid profile within target range on atorvastatin.
label: cardio

text: Emergency admission with palpitations and dizziness. ECG: atrial fibrillation. Started on anticoagulation and rate-control therapy.
label: cardio
